title: Purchasing RP Disabled...
body:
Hey, I'm trying to purchase some mystery skins but I don't have sufficient RP. The Purchase RP button is nowhere to be found and there isn't any info on it being down anywhere... for example status.leagueoflegends.com shows that the store is fully operational.

pls help.

replies.body: Was a brief maintenance.  There was some miscommunication on timing so tickers were a bit late to go up in-client, but everything should be complete and back to normal now :)

It says it is down right at the top of the client.  They are just doing maintenance on the store.  Probably be back up later today or tomorrow.  Look for the teal diamond with the exclamation point it at top left in the client.
